name: OUYA Craft
description:
A minecraft style sandbox game built for ouya.  Check out the ouya.world forums if you have any feedback or issue.  Lots of features planned for the future stay tuned for more updates!

LT - place

RT - Break

LB/RB -Scroll blocks

O - Jump

Y - pause

Recommended you install on the ouya not external storage. Save and quit your worlds before exiting game to avoid corrupting your save.

V 1.0:

First official release!

Day/Night Cycle

Creative Mode

Infinite world Gen

Many different types of blocks

Lots of bugfixes since gamejam version
